<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Bleeding Finisher](/Feats.aspx?ID=1538) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Finisher" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=322" />
<trait label="Swashbuckler" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=321" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 91 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your blow inflicts profuse bleeding. Make a slashing or piercing Strike with a weapon or unarmed attack that allows you to add your precise strike damage. If you hit, the target also takes [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) equal to your precise strike finisher damage.
name: Bleeding Finisher
